title: Rollback Feasibility Scoring Engine Configuration
description: Configuration schema defining base complexity weights for R-01 calculation (Rollback Complexity Index), directly utilized by MEE/L2 simulation.

default_weights.description: Base complexity scores and functional dependencies used in R-01 formula.

artifact_size_exponent.description: Exponent applied to artifact size (scaled units) in R-01 score.

manifest_depth_linear_factor.description: Linear factor for complexity based on the count of change manifest entries.

persistence_impact_modifier.description: Modifier applied when the transition involves stateful persistence layers.

target_specific_multipliers.description: Multipliers applied based on the GSC V4.0 transition target type (LOGIC_CORE typically carries higher intrinsic risk).
